unableToSell: If you purchase this token, you may not be able to sell it back.
anynoneCanCreate: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects.
networkSlow: The current network speed is slow, we recommend to change the RPC node.
tryRefresh: Error connecting. Try refreshing the page.
connectNetworkTip: Please connect to the appropriate network.
totalUnclaimedRewards: Total unclaimed rewards of all pools
undefinedError: The transaction cannot succeed due to undefined error. This is probably an issue with one of the tokens you are swapping.
priceMovementError: This transaction will not succeed either due to price movement or fee on transfer. Try increasing your slippage tolerance.
customTokensTip: Tip: Custom tokens are stored locally in your browser
removeTips: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current  rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
slogan2: Safe and transparent, super low trading fee
priceImpactPrompt: This swap has a price impact of at least {{percent}}%. Please type the word "confirm" to continue with this swap.
priceImpactConfirm: This swap has a price impact of at least {{percent}}%. Please confirm that you would like to continue with this swap.
routeTips: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
expertModeTips: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result  in bad rates and lost funds.
expertModeWarning: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
confirmTransaction: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
stakeTips: You can withdraw your staked LP tokens anytime.
claimTips: You can harvest your rewards. Anytime adding or withdrawing LP tokens can also get you rewards.
depositTips: You can withdraw your staked tokens anytime.
depositClaimTips: You can harvest rewards anytime. Anytime adding or withdrawing your position will also get your rewards at the same time.
commonBasesTips: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
selectTokenToFind: Select a token to find your liquidity.
useToolFindPair: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
youHaveNoLiquidity: You donâ€™t have liquidity in this pool yet.
ratioSetPrice: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
readyToSupply: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
liquidityTips: By providing liquidity, you can get your LP tokens. Stake your LP tokens and then get your KST rewards that the amount of rewards is calculated based on your liquidity proportion in the corresponding mining pool, and the user transaction fees will go into the community development fund pool for project development and KST repurchase.
noPoolJoined: Don't see a pool you joined
viewYourLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
lpIncentiveDesc: Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
priceChangeRevert: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{ allowedSlippage }}%, your transaction will revert.
sellAtMost: Input is estimated. You will sell at most
receiveAtLeast: Output is estimated. You will receive at least
estimatedPriceDifference: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
transactionRevertIfPriceMovement: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price change before it is confirmed.
swapFeeTips: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to community development fund.
directPairOnly: Restrict swaps to direct pairs only.
expertModeRiskTips: Bypass confirmation modals and allow high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
transactionWillRevert: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
slippageTips: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
installWeb3MobileBrowser: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
installMetamask: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.
betaWarning: This project is in beta. Use at your own risk.
searchOrPaste: Search Token Name, Symbol, or Address
unknownError: Oops! An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page, or visit from another browser or device.
enterValueCont: Enter a {{ missingCurrencyValue }} value to continue.
noRecipient: Enter a wallet address to send to.
invalidRecipient: Please enter a valid wallet address recipient.
mustBeETH: One of the input must be ETH.
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: Enter a {{ inputCurrency }} or {{ label }} value to continue.
totalSupplyIs: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is
youAreSettingExRate: You are setting the initial exchange rate to

tokenWorth: At current exchange rate, each pool token is worth
firstLiquidity: You are the first person to add liquidity!
initialExchangeRate: The initial exchange rate will be set based on your deposits. Please make sure that your ETH and {{ label }} deposits have the same fiat value.

label: Label
name: Name
enterTokenCont: Enter a token address to continue
brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with Uniswap V1. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
